00016     public class DNSServiceException : Exception
00017     {
00018         string s = null;
00019         string f = null;
00020         DNSServiceErrorType e = DNSServiceErrorType.kDNSServiceErr_NoError;
00021 
00022         internal DNSServiceException(string s)
00023         {
00024             this.s = s;
00025         }
00026 
00027         internal DNSServiceException(string function, DNSServiceErrorType error)
00028         {
00029             e = error;
00030             f = function;
00031             s = String.Format("An error occured in the function '{0}': {1}",
00032                 function, error);
00033         }
00034 
00039         public override string ToString()
00040         {
00041             return s;
00042         }
00043 
00047         public override string Message
00048         {
00049             get { return s; }
00050         }
00051 
00055         public string Function { get { return f; } }
00060         public DNSServiceErrorType ErrorType { get { return e; } }
00061     }
00062 
00071     public abstract class DNSService
00072     {
00073         private UnixSocket socket;
00077         protected IntPtr sdRef;
00081         protected bool stopping = false;
00082 
00083         private bool inPoll = false;
00084         private EventWaitHandle stoppingPoll = new EventWaitHandle(false, EventResetMode.AutoReset);
00085 
00086         private void PollInvokeable()
00087         {
00088             try
00089             {
00090                 mDNSImports.DNSServiceProcessResult(sdRef);
00091             }
00092             catch (Exception e)
00093             {
00094                 Console.WriteLine("Got an exception on DNSServiceProcessResult (Unamanaged, so via user callback?)\n{0}{1}", e, e.StackTrace);
00095             }
00096         }
00097 
00098         private bool mAllowApplicationForms = true;
00105         public bool AllowApplicationForms
00106         {
00107             get { return mAllowApplicationForms; }
00108             set { mAllowApplicationForms = value; }
00109         }
00110 
00111         System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke mInvokeableObject = null;
00122         public System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke InvokeableObject
00123         {
00124             get { return mInvokeableObject; }
00125             set { mInvokeableObject = value; }
00126         }
00127 
00128         private bool mAllowMultithreadedCallbacks = false;
00145         public bool AllowMultithreadedCallbacks
00146         {
00147             get { return mAllowMultithreadedCallbacks; }
00148             set { mAllowMultithreadedCallbacks = value; }
00149         }
00150 
00151         internal void InheritInvokeOptions(DNSService fromService)
00152         {
00153             AllowApplicationForms = fromService.AllowApplicationForms;
00154             InvokeableObject = fromService.InvokeableObject;
00155             AllowMultithreadedCallbacks = fromService.AllowMultithreadedCallbacks;
00156         }
00157 
00158         private System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke GetInvokeObject()
00159         {
00160             if (mInvokeableObject != null) return mInvokeableObject;
00161 
00162             if (mAllowApplicationForms)
00163             {
00164                 /* need to post it to self over control thread */
00165                 FormCollection forms = System.Windows.Forms.Application.OpenForms;
00166 
00167                 if (forms != null && forms.Count > 0)
00168                 {
00169                     Control control = forms[0];
00170                     return control;
00171                 }
00172             }
00173             return null;
00174         }
00175 
00183         protected object Invoke(Delegate method, params object[] args)
00184         {
00185             System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke invokeable;
00186             
00187             invokeable = GetInvokeObject();
00188 
00189             if (invokeable != null)
00190             {
00191                 return invokeable.Invoke(method, args);
00192             }
00193 
00194             if (mAllowMultithreadedCallbacks)
00195             {
00196                 method.DynamicInvoke(args);
00197             }
00198 
00199             return null;
00200         }
00201 
00202         private void AsyncPollCallback(IAsyncResult result)
00203         {
00204             bool ret = socket.EndPoll(result);
00205 
00206             if (stopping)
00207             {
00208                 inPoll = false;
00209                 stoppingPoll.Set();
00210                 return; /* if we're stopping, don't begin a new poll */
00211             }
00212 
00213             if (ret)
00214             {
00215                 MethodInvoker cb = new MethodInvoker(PollInvokeable);
00216 
00217                 Invoke(cb, null);
00218             }
00219 
00220             inPoll = true;
00221             AsyncCallback callback = new AsyncCallback(AsyncPollCallback);
00222             socket.BeginPoll(-1, SelectMode.SelectRead, callback);
00223         }
00224 
00228         protected void WaitStop()
00229         {
00230             if (inPoll)
00231             {
00232                 stopping = true;
00233                 socket.Stop();
00234                 stoppingPoll.WaitOne();
00235             }
00236         }
00237 
00243         protected void SetupWatchSocket()
00244         {
00245             Int32 socketId = mDNSImports.DNSServiceRefSockFD(sdRef);
00246             socket = new UnixSocket(socketId);
00247 
00248             AsyncCallback callback = new AsyncCallback(AsyncPollCallback);
00249 
00250             stopping = false;
00251             inPoll = true;
00252             IAsyncResult ar = socket.BeginPoll(-1, SelectMode.SelectRead, callback);
00253         }
00254 
00255     }
00256 }
